gather.description: Get all the assets that need to be uploaded at one time. If this option is specified, the 'uploader' function needs to return a result 'map' synchronously.(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#gather).

exclude.description: Types of assets that do not need to upload(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#exclude).

include.description: Types of assets that only need to upload(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#include).

clean.description: If this option is specified, when the assets has been uploaded successfully, it will not emit to local directory(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#clean).

replace.description: Replace reference link of the uploaded assets.(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#replace)

useRealFilename.description: Normally the plugin will use pathname like '/path/path/filename.ext' to replace the local file url, set this option true to use its real filename 'filename.ext'.
